name: Bibimbap
description: Bibimbap is a popular Korean rice bowl mixed with vegetables, chili pepper paste, soy sauce, and a raw or fried egg.

name: Bulgogi
description: Bulgogi is a Korean grilled dish made with thinly sliced marinated beef or pork, cooked on a barbecue or stove-top griddle.

name: Japchae
description: Japchae is a Korean stir-fried noodle dish made with sweet potato starch noodles, vegetables, beef, and soy sauce.

name: Kimchi
description: Kimchi is a traditional Korean side dish made from salted and fermented vegetables, usually napa cabbage and Korean radish, with a variety of seasonings.

name: Kimbap
description: Kimbap is a Korean seaweed rice roll stuffed with vegetables, egg, and meat, served sliced into bite-size pieces.

name: Samgyeopsal
description: Samgyeopsal is a Korean grilled pork belly dish that is usually grilled at the table and served with lettuce leaves and a variety of condiments.

name: Tteokbokki
description: Tteokbokki is a popular Korean street food made with chewy rice cakes, fish cakes, and a spicy red pepper sauce.

name: Haemul Pajeon
description: Haemul Pajeon is a savory Korean pancake made with scallions and seafood such as shrimp, squid, and oysters.
